title: AI-Powered Chatbot Development
description: A project focused on building a customer support chatbot using machine learning and natural language processing.
specialNotes: Requires access to large language model API

title: E-Commerce Platform for Local Businesses
description: Developing a scalable e-commerce platform to support small local businesses with inventory management and online sales.
specialNotes: Collaboration with local business association required

title: Blockchain-Based Voting System
description: Creating a secure and transparent voting system using blockchain technology to ensure election integrity.

title: Mobile App for Mental Health Monitoring
description: A mobile application to help users track their mental health and receive insights based on their activity and mood.

title: Smart City Traffic Management System
description: Developing an IoT-based traffic management system to optimize traffic flow and reduce congestion in urban areas.
specialNotes: Requires coordination with local transportation department

title: Augmented Reality Educational Platform
description: Creating an AR platform to enhance learning experiences in STEM subjects for high school students.
specialNotes: Collaboration with local high schools for testing
